name: Voxel artifact quest
description:
An interesting free surreal 3d quest with simple games, puzzles and enjoyable relaxing music.

This captivating and surreal isometric voxel cubics quest is provided with puzzles, simple games and listenable trance music.

Space invaders have attacked the planet of the main character. They have stolen the planets’ lands and have converted them into the artifacts, which were hidden in illusive worlds.
So you’ll go into the sophisticated road to these worlds finding relics and artifacts.
You’ll meet evergreen valleys with magnificent monuments and gloomy dark worlds. Each world is unique is either a monument or a valley of sculptures. You must interact with feasts trying to do quests. As a result you’ll find the exit in this captivating and innovative adventure with uncommon worlds.
